label: substitutedProduct
comment: A referenced product substituted for this supply chain trade line item.
A referenced product that is substituted by this trade product.

rangeIncludes.comment: A reference to a product or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trading purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of information specific to an item being used or reported on for supply chain trade purposes.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
